tool.name: libraries
tool.command:
parsec libraries upload_file_from_local_path --library_id "$library_id" --file_local_path "$file_local_path"
#if $folder_id --folder_id "$folder_id" #end if #if $file_type --file_type "$file_type" #end if #if $dbkey --dbkey "$dbkey" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: library_id
input.label: library_id
input.help: id of the library where to place the uploaded file

input.name: file_local_path
input.label: file_local_path
input.help: path of local file to upload

input.name: folder_id
input.help: id of the folder where to place the uploaded file. If not provided, the root folder will be used

tool.help: Read local file contents from file_local_path and upload data to a library.
